typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as short,
		name as string,
		sal as short,
		dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employee1
source(output(
		id as short,
		name as string,
		sal as short,
		dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employee2
employee1, employee2 union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['employee_union.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		sal,
		dept
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
